description: A list of all chunks which make up the document

content.description: The text content of the chunk.

element_id.description: A unique identifier for the chunk.

type.description: The semantic type of the chunk (e.g., Title, Text, Table).

page_num.description: The page number where the element is located.

height.description: The height of the element's bounding box.

width.description: The width of the element's bounding box.

bbox.description: An array of four [x, y] coordinate pairs defining the bounding box.

image_path.description: Optional: Path to an extracted image of the element.

link_path.description: Optional: URL or path associated with a link.
